title: Punishment of AFK When lag
body:
I only have one lioten ask if there is anyone who can answer it to me. I have had a penalty for a while now but I do not get rid of it. you can write to riot and ask if they can take it away? for it will probably end up with I do not play leage longer if it continues like this
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)  is not something that player support can remove, and is entirely in the player's power to do so.  The best way to do that is to play without leaves and play the required games provided by leaverbuster.  Let me know if you have any questions!
